## ThemeImpl.(constructor)

Creates a new Theme instance using the params defined in the spec. Also allows for optional overrides and variants using a config object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(spec: ThemeSpec, config?: ThemeConfig);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  spec | [ThemeSpec](./core.themespec.md) | the theme specification |
|  config | [ThemeConfig](./core.themeconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> the theme configuration |
